intro: Psychotria plana, commonly known as the flat psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant typically grows as an upright shrub with simple, opposite leaves that are often pubescent. Its flowers are small, clustered in cymes, and usually have five petals. Psychotria plana is notable for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
